content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the 'web_search' command to search for the best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area, but the website returned no results. I then used the 'google' command and received a list of relevant links, including the AllTrails website. However, when I used the 'browse_website' command again, there was an error with no text to summarize.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "question": "What are the best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "web_search", "args": {"query": "best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command web_search returned: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "question": "What are the best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "http://experienceeurope.eu/hiking-in-brno-my-top-5/", "https://littleholidays.net/blog/brno-czech-republic-where-to-stay/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g274714-d6701144-Reviews-Brno_Dam-Brno_South_Moravian_Region_Moravia.html", "https://www.trip.com/travel-guide/attraction/brno/brno-dam-58316975/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/AttractionsNear-g274714-d4381314-Brno_Kralovo_Pole_Station-Brno_South_Moravian_Region_Moravia.html"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What are the best hiking trails in the Brno Reservoir area?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on running routes in the Brno Reservoir area in Czechia. While there isn't a loop trail around the entire reservoir, there are some sections of waterfront path or roadside sidewalk. The article maps out an 8 km route in the reservoir area, which includes rolling hills. Additionally, there are a couple of decent options for running near the 13th-century Veveří Castle, located a few km west of the reservoir. The article also mentions bus access to the area. However, it does not provide information on hiking trails or the best hiking trails in the area.\n\nLinks: ['About (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'About Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'Great Runs Team (https://greatruns.com/great-runs-team/)', 'Working With Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/working-with-great-runs/)', 'GR in the Media (https://greatruns.com/as-seen-in/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
